Name: Young Griffon (Medium)
Traits: Keen Sight. The griffon has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.
Actions: Multiattack. The griffon makes two attacks: one with its beak and one with its claws. Beak. Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d6 + 1) piercing damage. Claws. Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (2d4 + 1) slashing damage.
